name: Medical Power of Attorney
description: A legal document appointing someone to make healthcare decisions if you become incapacitated

sections.title: MEDICAL POWER OF ATTORNEY
sections.content: This Medical Power of Attorney is made on {effective_date} by {principal_name}, residing at {principal_address} (the 'Principal').

sections.title: 1. APPOINTMENT OF AGENT
sections.content: I, {principal_name}, designate and appoint {agent_name}, residing at {agent_address}, telephone number {agent_phone}, as my agent to make healthcare decisions for me as authorized in this document.

sections.title: 2. ALTERNATE AGENT
sections.content: If my agent is unable or unwilling to serve, I designate {alternate_agent_name}, residing at {alternate_agent_address}, telephone number {alternate_agent_phone}, as my alternate agent.

sections.title: 3. EFFECTIVE DATE AND DURABILITY
sections.content: This power of attorney becomes effective when I can no longer make my own healthcare decisions and continues in effect until my death or until I revoke it.

sections.title: 4. AGENT'S POWERS
sections.content: My agent is authorized to obtain and review medical records, reports, and information about me and to make all healthcare decisions for me, including consent, refusal of consent, or withdrawal of consent to any care, treatment, service, or procedure to maintain, diagnose, or treat a physical or mental condition.

sections.title: 5. LIFE-SUSTAINING TREATMENT
sections.content: My wishes regarding life-sustaining treatment are as follows: {life_sustaining_treatment}

sections.title: 6. ARTIFICIAL NUTRITION AND HYDRATION
sections.content: My wishes regarding artificial nutrition and hydration are as follows: {artificial_nutrition}

sections.title: 7. PAIN RELIEF
sections.content: My wishes regarding pain relief are as follows: {pain_medication}

sections.title: 8. HOSPITAL/HEALTHCARE FACILITY PREFERENCES
sections.content: My preferences regarding hospitals or healthcare facilities are as follows: {hospital_preferences}

sections.title: 9. RELIGIOUS PREFERENCES
sections.content: My religious preferences concerning medical treatment are as follows: {religious_preferences}

sections.title: 10. ORGAN DONATION
sections.content: My wishes regarding organ donation are as follows: {organ_donation}

sections.title: 11. AUTOPSY PREFERENCES
sections.content: My preferences regarding autopsy are as follows: {autopsy_preferences}

sections.title: 13. SIGNATURES
